1346880.name: Midsummer Night Soundtrack
1346880.description:
As the author of Midsummer Night, I was stunned when I heard these tracks the first time. Andy Kosakovsky, the composer I am lucky to work with, has created a true masterpiece, which resonates perfectly with every event of the game as well as a human soul.

If you're interested in genuine musical art, that's the OST you're looking for!

The DLC includes remastered version of each track + 2 bonus tracks.
